title: Tickled Pink: A Comic Novel
description: Two young women--Mindy Solomon who dreams of becoming a Broadway dancer, and Ursula Duran, seeking an escape from her overbearing mother--come to New York to pursue their individual aspirations but soon find their lives taking whole new directions as Mindy becomes a stand-up comic and Ursula becomes a cover girl, in a whimsical story of friendship, fame, and the pursuit of happiness. A first novel.
author: Rita Rudner
